title: Westgate Bridge
creator_credit: Cine Service Films and Geoffrey Thompson
brief_description: The story of the eventful construction of Westgate Bridge which will eventually link Melbourne’s southern and western suburbs. The projected date of completion is now 1977, but industrial disputes and a calamitous collapse of part of the structure have delayed the estimated date of completion.
